item.title: Announcements
item.dc:creator: @xdeathxmagex xdeathxmagex
item.description:
@xdeathxmagex wrote:

here:

						else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2253)
					{
						if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
						{
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Blinkidy"))
							{
								npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Blinkidy is online!";
							}
							else
							{
								npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Blinkidy is offline!";
							}
												}
			}

Change the NPC ID to what you want it to be, and make sure to add this in NPCHandler.java not client.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Announcements
item.dc:creator: @blinkidy blinkidy
item.description:
@blinkidy wrote:

on a server i recently saw a npc saying if the owner is on or offline and it updated, please help so i can say like “blinkidy is now online”

I got this code but it dosent seem to work

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2168) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if(PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Blinkidy")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Blinkidy IS ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Blinkidy IS OFFLINE"; } } } }

Read full topic
